metadata.name: Unstable Diffusion #1
metadata.description:
Wake up. The Unstable Diffusion collection attempts to capture the spontaneous and painful mental dissonance caused by anxiety and inbred weirdness. The art combines a trained probabilistic diffusion model (a set of parametrised Markov chains) and various genart post-processing techniques.

Inspired by the late Francisco Goya's Black Paintings series that he created in seclusion, unwell, deaf and isolated from the public. This group of 14 paintings is considered to be one of the most intense reflections of the torments of the artist's sickly mind.

For the curious ones, each "Diffusion" carries 12 secret words. Follow the white rabbit.

Composition, colour mapping, animations, glitches and data moshing effects were done using python/bash scripting. Coded and rendered back in Jan-Jun 2022, long before Stable Diffusion, Dall-e and Midjourney's arrival.

Resolution: 1024x1024px  
Duration: 1 minute 33 seconds  
Format: MP4
